__e: So, Murphy, are you coming or not? .
Murphy, you don't have to do this.
Alex Murphy passed away just hours ago.
We have reason to believe that your Agent Murphy may have been one of them.
What if Murphy's who they say he is and there's a chance for a vaccine?
Got me thinking, If that tiny amount of Murphy blood could keep this guy from turning, what would a little bit more blood do?
I know what Murphy said and I knew she would blow this out of proportion, so let me explain...
You're telling me that the bullet passed through Murphy and hit this dude in the heart?
Take this leap of faith with me, John Murphy, and let me show you there is so much more for you... than this.
She's with Murphy and she's headed to the same place we are.
